front.title: Health informatics--Point-of-care medical device communication Part 30200: Transport profile--Cable connected Amendment 1
front.abstract: ISO/IEEE Std 11073-30200:2004 is extended in this amendment to include IEEE 802.3 100BASE-T and analysis of the compatibility of cable connections between ISO/IEEE Std 11073-30200:2004 and IEEE Std 802.3â„¢-2008.
